title: battery drain
body:
cool app, that "lol friend", but am I the only one that the battery seems being drain a lot? like usually i can have like 40% the evening and today i have 20% in the late afternoon... :( love the app, but this tho..
(i don't use the phone more that usual today ;) so do not point that out)

replies.body:
Hey Dr Doylock,
The app is set up in a way that shouldn't have a major effect on your battery life. When you close/background the app the connection is closed and the app should essentially sleep. If you can check Android's battery graph in settings you should be able to see what has been using more of your batter life. If it does happen to show the League Friends app as using a large percentage, please post a screenshot and we can look into it more.

Thanks for contacting us!
